R

RandomMapCreator - Class in engine
RandomMapCreator is a class that represents a random matrix that represents a map
RandomMapCreator(int, int) - Constructor for class engine.RandomMapCreator
Constructor
readNode(NodeList, NodeList) - Method in class map.MapG
the function reads from the nodeList (xml) the values of the attributes and updates _map based on it from both floorList and wallList
removeFromMap() - Method in class unit.MovingUnit
remove the moving unit from the Map and remove the global Unit List, stop all timers and nullify the graphic class
removeFullWall(Block) - Static method in class mainInitialize.GameStats
removes fullwall block from the list (uses comparison based on addresses)
removeHalfWall(Block) - Static method in class mainInitialize.GameStats
removes halfwall block from the list (uses comparison based on addresses)
removeOccupied(int, int) - Static method in class mainInitialize.GameStats
remove occupied Point from the playerOccupied list
resetAllKeys() - Method in class engine.input.KeyboardInput
 
resetCurrent() - Method in class unit.player.ApparelSet
set to default (first) option for both weapons or clothing.
restartGame(boolean) - Static method in class mainInitialize.GameStats
Restarts the entire game with a choise of creating a new map or keeping the last one.
restartPositions() - Static method in class mainInitialize.GameStats
empties all of the global lists and initiates all positions of the Units if there is no custom graphics its sets a default
rotate(Img, double) - Static method in class ultilityTools.ImageTools
Rotates an image.
